text: The University of Bordeaux 1 is a French university, in the Academy of Bordeaux. Its main campus is in Talence. It has many important laboratories such as * Centre de Neurosciences Intégratives et Cognitives (CNIC), a neuroscience research center * Laboratoire Bordelais de Recherche en Informatique (LaBRI), a computer science research center ==See also== *University of Bordeaux *List of public universities in France by academy ==References== Category:University of Bordeaux 1 Bordeaux 1
title: University of Bordeaux 1
